overview: Ali wants to be a filmmaker but he is feeling uninspired and pressured with other things that distracts him from pursuing his dreams. He decided to go back to his hometown, Perlis on a break which took him on a surreal time travel journey when he meets a fellow train passenger named Umar Ghazi who loves collecting vintage items. Will Ali get his mojo back in Arau and what is the connection with Umar, UFOs and Ahmad Jais?
title: Pasport Ekspres
